analysis.description:
Ixellion.startDate (/unique_chucks/37/0x5d385bedbc17a34c005f868a2103aa906c38d5da.sol#111-112) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/37/0x5d385bedbc17a34c005f868a2103aa906c38d5da.sol#222-234)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/37/0x5d385bedbc17a34c005f868a2103aa906c38d5da.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/37/0x5d385bedbc17a34c005f868a2103aa906c38d5da.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/37/0x5d385bedbc17a34c005f868a2103aa906c38d5da.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
